subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Red Sox beat the Yankees Saturday, but for General Managers Brian Cashman and Theo Epstein, the condition of Doug Mientkiewicz, who had been racked up in a collision during the game, was more important.
snippet: The Red Sox beat the Yankees Saturday, but for General Managers Brian Cashman and Theo Epstein, the condition of Doug Mientkiewicz, who had been racked up in a collision during the game, was more important.
